verses.text: Later, \w the|strong="H5922"\w* prophets \w Haggai|strong="H2292"\w* \w and|strong="H2148"\w* \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w* \w son|strong="H1247"\w* \w of|strong="H1247"\w* \w Iddo|strong="H5714"\w* \w prophesied|strong="H5013"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3062"\w* \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3061"\w* \w and|strong="H2148"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w* \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w name|strong="H8036"\w* \w of|strong="H1247"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* God \w of|strong="H1247"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3479"\w*, \w who|strong="H1768"\w* \w was|strong="H8036"\w* \w over|strong="H5922"\w* \w them|strong="H5922"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1768"\w* \w Zerubbabel|strong="H2217"\w* \w son|strong="H1247"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w Shealtiel|strong="H7598"\w* \w and|strong="H1005"\w* \w Jeshua|strong="H3443"\w* \w son|strong="H1247"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w Jozadak|strong="H3136"\w* rose \w up|strong="H6966"\w* \w and|strong="H1005"\w* \w began|strong="H8271"\w* \w to|strong="H5974"\w* \w rebuild|strong="H1124"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* God \w in|strong="H6966"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*. \w And|strong="H1005"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5029"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* God \w were|strong="H1768"\w* \w with|strong="H5974"\w* \w them|strong="H5974"\w*, \w helping|strong="H5583"\w* \w them|strong="H5974"\w*.

At \w that|strong="H2942"\w* \w time|strong="H2166"\w* \w Tattenai|strong="H8674"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w governor|strong="H6347"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w region|strong="H5675"\w* west \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* Euphrates, \w Shethar-bozenai|strong="H8370"\w*, \w and|strong="H1005"\w* their associates went \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* Jews \w and|strong="H1005"\w* asked, “\w Who|strong="H4479"\w* authorized \w you|strong="H5922"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w rebuild|strong="H1124"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w temple|strong="H1005"\w* \w and|strong="H1005"\w* restore \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w structure|strong="H3635"\w*?”

\w They|strong="H3660"\w* \w also|strong="H3660"\w* asked, “\w What|strong="H4479"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w names|strong="H8036"\w* \w of|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w men|strong="H1400"\w* \w who|strong="H1768"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* constructing \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w building|strong="H1124"\w*?”

But \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w eye|strong="H5870"\w* \w of|strong="H5922"\w* their God \w was|strong="H1934"\w* \w on|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w elders|strong="H7868"\w* \w of|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3062"\w*, \w so|strong="H5705"\w* \w that|strong="H3062"\w* \w they|strong="H3809"\w* \w were|strong="H1934"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w* stopped \w until|strong="H5705"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* report \w was|strong="H1934"\w* sent \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w Darius|strong="H1868"\w* \w and|strong="H1934"\w* \w written|strong="H5407"\w* instructions \w about|strong="H5922"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w matter|strong="H2941"\w* \w were|strong="H1934"\w* \w returned|strong="H8421"\w*.

\w This|strong="H5922"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* text \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* letter \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w Tattenai|strong="H8674"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w governor|strong="H6347"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w region|strong="H5675"\w* west \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* Euphrates, \w Shethar-bozenai|strong="H8370"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* their associates, \w the|strong="H5922"\w* officials \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w region|strong="H5675"\w*, \w sent|strong="H7972"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w King|strong="H4430"\w* \w Darius|strong="H1868"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3606"\w* \w report|strong="H6600"\w* \w they|strong="H3606"\w* \w sent|strong="H7972"\w* \w him|strong="H5922"\w* read \w as|strong="H3606"\w* follows: \w To|strong="H5922"\w* \w King|strong="H4430"\w* \w Darius|strong="H1868"\w*: \w All|strong="H3606"\w* \w peace|strong="H8001"\w*.

Let \w it|strong="H1934"\w* \w be|strong="H1934"\w* \w known|strong="H3046"\w* \w to|strong="H3046"\w* \w the|strong="H3046"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* went into \w the|strong="H3046"\w* \w province|strong="H4083"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3061"\w*, \w to|strong="H3046"\w* \w the|strong="H3046"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w the|strong="H3046"\w* \w great|strong="H7229"\w* God. \w The|strong="H3046"\w* people \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w rebuilding|strong="H1124"\w* \w it|strong="H1934"\w* \w with|strong="H1124"\w* \w large|strong="H7229"\w* stones \w and|strong="H4430"\w* placing timbers \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3046"\w* \w walls|strong="H3797"\w*. \w This|strong="H1791"\w* \w work|strong="H5673"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* being \w carried|strong="H5648"\w* \w out|strong="H5648"\w* diligently \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* prospering \w in|strong="H4430"\w* their \w hands|strong="H3028"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3660"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* questioned \w the|strong="H1124"\w* \w elders|strong="H7868"\w* \w and|strong="H1005"\w* \w asked|strong="H7593"\w*, “\w Who|strong="H4479"\w* authorized you \w to|strong="H2942"\w* \w rebuild|strong="H1124"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w temple|strong="H1005"\w* \w and|strong="H1005"\w* restore \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w structure|strong="H3635"\w*?”

\w We|strong="H1768"\w* also \w asked|strong="H7593"\w* \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w their|strong="H7593"\w* \w names|strong="H8036"\w*, \w so|strong="H1768"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w could|strong="H1768"\w* \w write|strong="H3790"\w* \w down|strong="H3790"\w* \w the|strong="H3046"\w* \w names|strong="H8036"\w* \w of|strong="H1768"\w* \w their|strong="H7593"\w* leaders \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w your|strong="H1768"\w* \w information|strong="H3046"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4430"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w answer|strong="H6600"\w* \w they|strong="H3660"\w* \w returned|strong="H8421"\w*: “\w We|strong="H1768"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w servants|strong="H5649"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* God \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* earth, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w rebuilding|strong="H1124"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w temple|strong="H1005"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w was|strong="H1934"\w* \w built|strong="H1124"\w* \w many|strong="H7690"\w* \w years|strong="H8140"\w* \w ago|strong="H6928"\w*, \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H7229"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3479"\w* \w built|strong="H1124"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* completed.

\w But|strong="H3861"\w* \w since|strong="H1768"\w* \w our|strong="H4481"\w* fathers \w angered|strong="H7265"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* God \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*, \w He|strong="H1768"\w* \w delivered|strong="H3052"\w* \w them|strong="H1994"\w* \w into|strong="H1541"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w hand|strong="H3028"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* Babylon, \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w Chaldean|strong="H3679"\w* \w who|strong="H1768"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H5642"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w temple|strong="H1005"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w carried|strong="H1541"\w* \w away|strong="H1541"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w people|strong="H5972"\w* \w to|strong="H1994"\w* Babylon.

\w In|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w first|strong="H2298"\w* \w year|strong="H8140"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w his|strong="H1768"\w* \w reign|strong="H4430"\w*, \w however|strong="H1297"\w*, \w Cyrus|strong="H3567"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* Babylon \w issued|strong="H7761"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w decree|strong="H2942"\w* \w to|strong="H2942"\w* \w rebuild|strong="H1124"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* God.

\w He|strong="H1768"\w* \w also|strong="H4430"\w* removed \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w temple|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* Babylon \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w gold|strong="H1722"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w silver|strong="H3702"\w* articles belonging \w to|strong="H1994"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* God, \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* \w had|strong="H4430"\w* \w taken|strong="H5312"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* carried \w there|strong="H1768"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w temple|strong="H1005"\w* \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*. \w King|strong="H4430"\w* \w Cyrus|strong="H3567"\w* \w gave|strong="H3052"\w* \w these|strong="H1994"\w* articles \w to|strong="H1994"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* man \w named|strong="H8036"\w* \w Sheshbazzar|strong="H8340"\w*, \w whom|strong="H1768"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w appointed|strong="H7761"\w* \w governor|strong="H6347"\w*

\w and|strong="H1005"\w* instructed, ‘\w Take|strong="H5376"\w* \w these|strong="H1994"\w* articles, \w put|strong="H5182"\w* \w them|strong="H1994"\w* \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w temple|strong="H1005"\w* \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*, \w and|strong="H1005"\w* let \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* God \w be|strong="H1005"\w* \w rebuilt|strong="H1124"\w* \w on|strong="H5922"\w* its original site.’

\w So|strong="H1768"\w* \w this|strong="H1791"\w* \w Sheshbazzar|strong="H8340"\w* \w came|strong="H1768"\w* \w and|strong="H1005"\w* \w laid|strong="H3052"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* foundation \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* God \w in|strong="H8000"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*, \w and|strong="H1005"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* time \w until|strong="H5705"\w* \w now|strong="H3705"\w* \w it|strong="H4481"\w* \w has|strong="H1768"\w* been \w under|strong="H4481"\w* \w construction|strong="H1124"\w*, \w but|strong="H1768"\w* \w it|strong="H4481"\w* \w has|strong="H1768"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w* yet been \w completed|strong="H8000"\w*.”

\w Now|strong="H3705"\w*, \w therefore|strong="H5922"\w*, \w if|strong="H2006"\w* \w it|strong="H5922"\w* \w pleases|strong="H2869"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w let|strong="H3705"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w search|strong="H1240"\w* \w be|strong="H1005"\w* \w made|strong="H7761"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w royal|strong="H4430"\w* \w archives|strong="H1005"\w* \w in|strong="H5922"\w* Babylon \w to|strong="H5922"\w* see \w if|strong="H2006"\w* \w King|strong="H4430"\w* \w Cyrus|strong="H3567"\w* did indeed \w issue|strong="H7761"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w decree|strong="H2942"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w rebuild|strong="H1124"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* God \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*. \w Then|strong="H1768"\w* \w let|strong="H3705"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w send|strong="H7972"\w* \w us|strong="H5922"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* decision \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w matter|strong="H1836"\w*.
